From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia




2022 Indian filmOdd CouplePoster of movie Odd CoupleDirected byPrashant JohariWritten byPraneet VermaPrashant JohariScreenplay byPrashant JohariProduced byPraneet VermaStarringDivyennduSuchitra Krishnamoorthi
Vijay Raaz Pranati Rai PrakashCinematographySrijit BasuEdited byPrakash JhaMusic byJay Rajesh AryaProductioncompanyNipram CreationsRelease date
2 August 2022 (2022-08-02)
[1][2]CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Odd Couple[3] is a 2022 Indian Hindi language film featuring Divyenndu, Vijay Raaz, Suchitra Krishnamoorthi, and Pranati Rai Prakash. It released directly on Amazon Prime Video, on 2 August 2022 to positive reviews.[4][5] Odd Couple was featured at the Indian Film Festival of Ireland, Imagine India Madrid, South Asian International Film Festival New York, Jaipur International Film Festival and many others.[6]


Plot[edit]
Odd Couple is a story based on the modern relationships,[7] values, and priorities in the midst of an exchange of marriage, caused by the registration authorities.[8] The story speaks about their oddness and evenness towards age differences, love, cosmos, and uncertainty in life with the Freudian slip.[9]

Cast[edit]
Divyenndu as Piyush Kumar
Suchitra Krishnamoorthi as Nivedita Verma
Vijay Raaz as Yogesh Pant
Pranati Rai Prakash as Nivedita 'Navi' Rao
Manoj Pahwa as Magistrate/ Judge Choutala
Kumar Rajput as Ganapathi Dhanush Katepalli Rao
Saharsh Kumar Shukla as Driver Sudhir
Sumit Gulati as Sunny
Pradeep Singh Adhikari as Post Man
Neha Negi
Chunmun Yadav
References[edit]


^ "Odd Couple : Movie Release date, Cast, Trailer, Rating & Reviews - Movie Talkies". 5 August 2022.

^ @taran_adarsh (4 August 2022). "After winning hearts at prestigious film festivals, #OddCouple - starring #Divyenndu, #VijayRaaz,…" (Tweet) – via Twitter.

^ "Odd Couple Trailer: शादियों की अदला-बदली पर बेस्ड है फिल्म, मिर्जापुर फेम मुन्ना भैया दिखे नये रोल में". 2 August 2022.

^ "Odd Couple Trailer".

^ "शादी की अदला-बदली पर है 'मुन्ना भैया' दिव्येंदु शर्मा की फिल्म, रिलीज हुआ Odd Couple का ट्रेलर". 3 August 2022.

^ "Odd Couple Review: An easy-breezy take on a modern-day relationship tangle". The Times of India.

^ "Odd Couple review: Vijay Raaz and Divyendu Sharma even out the odd bits in this urban comedy".

^ "Odd Couple Trailer: His wife got married to him, his wife's inse... E ta blunder hai bhai!". 2 August 2022.

^ "ऑड कपल ट्रेलर : इनकी बीवी की शादी उनसे हो गई, उनकी बीवी की इनसे... ई त ब्‍लंडर है भैया!".
